Html:
Hey all

I know you can change the colors for the ribbon as per http://blogs.microsoft.co.il/blogs/arik/archive/2009/10/22/windows-ribbon-for-winforms-part-9-changing-ribbon-colors.aspx, but is there a way to change colors for the contextual tab headers?

Thanks.
Hi, has someony any ideas, or is the Ribbon implenetaion in Win7 limited and lacks of this function?

As far as I know you can’t change the color of the tabs. :(

You can only change the color theme of your ribbon as I mentioned.
